alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Lower Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; Upper Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 9:16AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lafourche and central Jefferson Parishes through 945 AM CDT... At 916 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Larose, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Larose, Cut Off, Galliano, Lafitte and Barataria. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in New Orleans.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Lower Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; Upper Lafourche
